item.title: Carlson Rezidor has revealed plans for new hotel developments in India
item.description: The Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group has announced new deals and hotel openings in strategic locations within India, further solidifying its position as a leading international hotel group in the country. Thorsten Kirschke, President for Asia Pacific at Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group, highlighted the company’s accomplishments, stating that building upon a successful 2013, the first four months of this year have shown strong results in India and Thailand. He added that with 95 hotels currently operational, they anticipate exceeding 100 operating hotels in the Asia Pacific region by year-end.
